
# Get statistics for head detection efficiency
```{r, include=FALSE}
data_skeleton_with_headext %>%
  group_by(tp,TrackID,frame) %>%
  summarise(status = first(status)) %>%
  group_by(status) %>%
  summarise(occurences = n()) %>%
  mutate(occurences_total = sum(occurences)) %>%
  mutate(occurences_percentage=round(occurences/occurences_total*100,2))
  
```

# Check if head is always index == 1
```{r, include=FALSE}
data_skeleton_with_headext %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  filter(is_head == "YES" & index == 26) %>%
  summarise(n = n())

    
```

# How many annotated frames per tp
```{r, include=FALSE}
data_skeleton_with_headext %>%
  group_by(dataset_ID,tp,TrackID,frame) %>%
  filter(any(is_head=="YES")) %>%
  group_by(dataset_ID,tp) %>%
  summarise(number_of_postures = n()/26) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(total_number_of_postures = sum(number_of_postures)) %>%
  mutate(mean = mean(number_of_postures))

    
```
